item.name: Positive Scenarios
Ping Request #1
Create Token Request #2
Get All Booking Ids #3
Create New Booking #4
Get Single Booking i.e Freshly Created #5
Full Update of Booking i.e Freshly Created #6

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl -X PUT \
  https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking/1 \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -H 'Accept: application/json' \
  -H 'Cookie: token=abc123' \
  -d '{
    "firstname" : "James",
    "lastname" : "Brown",
    "totalprice" : 111,
    "depositpaid" : true,
    "bookingdates" : {
        "checkin" : "2018-01-01",
        "checkout" : "2019-01-01"
    },
    "additionalneeds" : "Breakfast"
}'

item.name: Get Single Booking i.e recently Updated #7
Partial Update of  any Existing ID #8
